body:
According to https://github.com/westes/flex/issues/219 it is supposed to coredump at build. 
On Cray XC40 using CC it worked fine so far (I will do more testing, but since it is supposed to break on build I am reporting that it isn't %gcc@7.3.0).

I simply commented out line 61 of
$SPACK_ROOT/var/spack/repos/builtin/packages/flex/package.py
obviously not what you would want me to do :-)

I can provide all info and logs you might want.
